name: United States
scope_notes: Prototype compliance mapping only. Entry is partial; US federal/state securities and adviser rules are complex. Always verify with qualified US counsel before any offering, marketing, or adviser activity.
marketing_notes: Treat any marketing to US persons as counsel-gated.
Offering exemptions, investor qualification, and materials review are critical.
licensing_notes: Adviser registration and broker/dealer perimeter issues are fact-specific.
tokenization_notes: Tokenization frequently triggers securities analysis; do not assume utility classification.
crypto_financing_notes: Crypto-related financing can materially increase enforcement and compliance risk.
